author: IGN
description:
OFF reviewed by Michael Higham on PC, also available on Nintendo Switch.

OFF is an important relic of the old RPG Maker scene, a pioneer in the realm of independent, small-scale RPGs that innovated in its own right. To have an accessible, modernized version that is a nearly 1-to-1 rerelease, without having to dig up old download links for a fan-translated version, is a win in itself. As a faithful remaster of a 2008 RPG Maker game, however, it also shows its age rather clearly, with a shallow turn-based combat system and barebones structure – such is the thing with aging. But even within those limitations, some things do age gracefully; the eerie atmosphere, off-kilter art style, cartoonish humor that feeds into a uniquely disturbing style of horror, and the breaking of convention that still sends chills down my spine. OFF walked so others could run – so, you don't have to love OFF, but you damn well better respect it.

#IGN #Gaming
title: OFF Review

author: IGN
description:
Join members of the Borderlands 4 development team for a behind-the-scenes look at the creation of Amon and how they brought the largest Vault Hunter to life in the upcoming first-person action looter shooter game. Borderlands 4 will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam) on September 12, 2025, and on Nintendo Switch 2 on October 3, 2025.

mon was raised in a Vault monster-worshipping cult—until the Vault was opened and the creature turned on everyone he loved. As the only survivor, he dedicates his life to finding and killing as many of these beasts as he can. Amon, a warrior-poet, is introspective and unflinching to his duty, but despite his hardened appearance, he has a warm attitude, often regaling comrades in arms with stories and advice earned throughout his travels.

#ign #gaming #Borderlands4
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Designing Amon: Beyond The Borderlands #8 Video

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's release date has been leaked, and you can expect to play is starting November 14th. Unless you're hoping to play on Switch 2, in which case you may be waiting a bit longer. Black Ops 7 is expected to hit pretty much every major console—yes, even PS4 and Xbox One—except the Nintendo ones. Microsoft and Nintendo have a legally binding agreement to bring Call of Duty to the Switch platform, so it's likely a case of 'when' and not 'if' when it comes to a Switch 2 port. In other news, screenwriter and Solid Snake voice actor David Hayter has finally played Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain. After voicing the character across several games starting with Metal Gear Solid in 1998, Hayter was unceremoniously booted from the role for MGS5 in 2015, only to be replaced by the more mainstream Keifer Sutherland. But Hayter has since gotten over it and played MGS5, which he thinks is 'amazing.' And we'll take a look at how all of Borderlands 4’s V
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Release Date Leaked - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Madden NFL 26 reviewed by Will Borger on Xbox Series X|S, also available on PlayStation 5, PC, and Nintendo Switch 2.

Madden NFL 26 sounded too good to be true, but EA pulled it off. This is simply a straight up better game than Madden 25, both on the field and off of it. There’s still room for improvement – there always is – but it’s hard to overstate what a leap this feels like in terms of presentation, the in-game action, and Franchise as a mode. There’s more to do for Superstar, and MUT is MUT, but this is a big step forward for Madden overall. As for the other stuff, well… there’s always next year, right? Turns out, sometimes you just gotta believe.
title: Madden NFL 26 Review

author: IGN
description:
John Cena, James Gunn and Peacemaker are back for a second season, this time in a shiny new shared universe. We got the first five episodes to review and all the bawdy, lewd, blood-soaked, grief-stricken, trauma-infused f-bomb enthusiasts are back to what they were up to last we saw them. But is more of the same from the 11th Street Kids enough to carry Peacemaker through another season and into the new DCU?

Christopher Smith aka Peacemaker is joined again by his BFFs, Freddie Stroma as Vigilante, Steve Agee as John Economos, Jennifer Holland as Emilia Harcourt, Danielle Brooks as Leota Adebayo. Even Auggie Smith, Chris' racist White Dragon dad makes it back somehow. Saturday Night Live legend Tim Meadows is the new guy along with Frank Grillo as new head of ARGUS and grieving father, Rick Flagg Sr., there to make sure Peacemaker doesn't live down the events of The Suicide Squad.

Let us know what you're most excited about for Season 2 of the HBO Max series and the future of James Gu
title: Peacemaker Season 2 (Episodes 1-5) Review | NO SPOILERS

author: IGN
description:
Experience the haunting opening of REANIMAL, the brand-new co-op mystery horror adventure from the creators of Little Nightmares I & II. This exclusive first look showcases 13 minutes of gameplay. While this gameplay was captured in single-player, the game is fully co-op, and is recommended to be played that way!

Play as a brother and sister on a desperate mission to rescue their missing friends. Explore a nightmarish island by boat and on foot, solving puzzles, surviving relentless dangers, and uncovering the dark secret that grips the land.

#IGN #Gaming
title: REANIMAL – The First 13 Minutes of the Mystery Horror Adventure (Exclusive Gameplay)

author: IGN
description:
Midnight Murder Club leaves early access, and the full release is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC via Steam. Watch the Midnight Murder Club launch trailer for this FPS party game, as the full version brings a new PvE mode called Graveyard Shift, along with new Wildcards. 

In Midnight Murder Club, face your friends in a heart-pounding, hilarious horror party game in the halls of a pitch-black mansion. Armed with a flashlight, revolver, and proximity chat, every match is a chaotic tale of screaming, surprises and tense shootouts. In the darkness, every decision counts.

#IGN #MidnightMurderClub #Partygame
title: Midnight Murder Club - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Earth has always played an important role in the Alien franchise, if even by its notable absence. Outside of a brief glimpse at the end of 1997's Alien: Resurrection, and a less brief glimpse in the alternate ending of that film, we’ve never seen what Alien’s future has in store for our  humble home… until now. Alien: Earth, as the title would suggest, is set almost entirely right here on the blue planet. We talked to Noah Hawley about the challenges of designing a brand new vision of Earth around the corporations that rule it, how to maintain a recognizable retro-future in the mold of the 1979 Ridley Scott film and how the creative team behind Alien: Earth avoided the dystopian traps of science fiction.

#IGN
title: Designing the Earth of Alien: Earth

author: IGN
description:
Join the cast and crew of The Terminal List: Dark Wolf for a behind-the-scenes look at the upcoming original prequel series, which dives into the origin story of Taylor Kitsch's character, Ben Edwards. Taylor Kitsch (executive producer and star), along with Chris Pratt (executive producer/"James Reece"), David Digilio (showrunner/executive producer) and Jack Carr (author & executive producer), discuss Ben Edwards, his story, how the character gets sucked into the CIA's Black Ops and the world of espionage, and how this prequel series differentiates from The Terminal List. The Terminal List: Dark Wolf comes to Prime Video on August 27, 2025.

The Terminal List: Dark Wolf is a prequel series to The Terminal List with an origin story that follows "Ben Edwards" throughout his journey from the Navy SEALs to the clandestine side of CIA Special Operations. The series is an espionage thriller that explores the darker side of warfare and the human cost that comes with it. It also features Chri
title: The Terminal List: Dark Wolf - Exclusive Behind the Scenes Clip (2025) Chris Pratt

Crimson Desert will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam), and Mac.

#IGN #Gaming
